text: Chionodes metallica is a moth in the family Gelechiidae. It is found in North America, where it has been recorded from southern Alberta, Montana and Wyoming.Chionodes at funetmothphotographersgroup The wingspan is 9.5-11.5 mm. The forewings are lustrous dark bronzy brown. The hindwings are shining pale fuscous, with slightly yellowish elongate scales on the disc.Proc. Acad. Nat. Sci. Philad. 73 : 9 ==References== Category:Chionodes Category:Moths described in 1921 Category:Moths of North America
title: Chionodes metallica
